Question: Unlike many generals this person did not turn to history to ask what Hannibal or Alexander or whoever did in a similar situation.
Hints: This person's own account was: "The most terrible of all my battles was the one before Moscow.
All historians agree that this person's remarkable personality was one key to his influence.
The soldiers responded with, "Vive L'Empereur!" and marched with this person to Paris; Louis XVIII fled.
